alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 1:01PM CDT until May 05 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Navarro, or 8 miles southeast of Corsicana, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Kerens, Trinidad, Angus, Navarro, Retreat, Oak Valley, Mildred, Eureka, Richland, Streetman, Goodlow, Powell and Mustang. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 213 and 234. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
